ItemTooltip.LuckyCoin: Hitting enemies will sometimes drop extra {$Rupee.rupees}
ItemTooltip.CoinGun:
Uses {$Rupee.rupees} for ammo
Higher valued {$Rupee.rupees} do more damage
ItemTooltip.CoinRing:
Increases {$Rupee.rupee} pickup range
Hitting enemies will sometimes drop extra {$Rupee.Rupees}
ItemTooltip.GreedyRing:
Increases {$Rupee.rupee} pickup range and shops have lower prices
Hitting enemies will sometimes drop extra {$Rupee.rupees}

LegacyDialog.148: Want me to pull a {$Rupee.rupee} from behind your ear? No? Ok.
LegacyDialog.195: If you want a merchant to move in, you will need to gather plenty of money. 50 {$Rupee.silver} {$Rupee.rupees} should do the trick!
LegacyDialog.381: Here you are again, taking all my {$Rupee.rupees}! Just grab it and begone from my sight!
LegacyDialog.391: Oh, so you just see me as a {$Rupee.rupee} sign, eh? 'Cus every time you see me, you ask me.
LegacyDialog.393: Bah! You again? You just grabbed some of my {$Rupee.rupees} just moments ago, so bugger off and come back later!

DyeTraderSpecialText.NoPlant_2: These dye bottles? Sorry dear friend, these don't take {$Rupee.rupees}. I only take the most precious and rare of flora in exchange for one of this!
